subject: Delivery address incorrect. SSN1979
description_text:
Hi everyone, I am writing about a mistake I done when I purchased the
linear actuators; order number SSN1979. Is it possible to have the delivery
address update as the billing address? At the moment the delivery address
is u13,63/67 Gladstone street Kogarah; is it possible to update it to 67
Dunmore Street South, Bexley, NSW, Australia.?
 Thanks, I will wait for your reply.
Kind regards,
Ripamonti Andrea.

conversations.body_text: 你好，Andrea Ripamonti，  不用担心——我已经将您的信息转发给我们的销售团队，他们今天就会为您处理。

Thank you! Have a good day.
Kind regards
Ripamonti Andrea

On Fri, 11 July 2025, 10:27 am service@simsonn.com,
Hi Andrea Ripamonti,    The sales team has confirmed that the address has been updated as per your request.
